cards.title: For teams and leaders
cards.text: Build teams faster with better outcomes. Reduce hiring and onboarding risk. Match people to projects based on evidence, not interviews.

cards.title: Privacy & control
cards.text: VirtualGlass captures signals needed to build a WorkFootPrint. You control what is shared. Matching uses derived representations of experience, not raw private content.

sections.title: "Guaranteed by construction" - what that means
sections.text: CVs and interviews can be inaccurate because they are based on claims, bias, and short snapshots. WorkTwins matches measured work experience to measured work experience.

items.q: Do I need to fill out a profile?
items.a: No. WorkTwins is built on 0-Input signals captured by VirtualGlass.

items.q: Can WorkTwins match across different languages or stacks?
items.a: Yes. It compares real work patterns and demonstrated experience, so it can find the best available match even when the perfect same-stack teammate is not available.
